about_the_game:
Set off on your adventure accompanied by troubled souls as you try to carry on living a world beyond redemption. Watch the story unfold as you face horrible creatures and slay them in old-school RPG style! It won't be easy, so make sure to come prepared and explore thoroughly as the city of Gris contains many dangerous secrets. It is down to you to save the realm and guide the heroes to the fulfilling life they are looking for.. or succumb to the void and watch them perish.

Horror-based Visual Novel

Experience four stories of the characters knee-deep in a mad, mad world. Being completely different people they have their own burdens to overcome in order to be able to see the bigger picture and play their part properly. The Gangster, Nun, Scientist, and the Bookworm: how could they have any sort of connection when they’ve never even met? Just pull one string and see the whole web coming into play.


Tactical combat

Kill the beings who stand in your way. They are here to devour you so there isn’t really any other option. The comfort of turn-based combat allows for a tactical approach: take your time, find the enemy’s weakness and strike. Except you’ll never face the same enemy twice, so make sure to utilize all the abilities of your party members if you wish to prevail.


Explore Gris

Get to the bottom of this mess. Explore the city. Pay attention. Find clues to solve the puzzles. You’ll crack it eventually. Or maybe not. Sometimes ignorance is bliss, especially when it comes to the murky goings on in the darkness.

short_description: Lovecraft-inspired mix of a visual novel and JRPG. Explore the story of four characters located in the dark city of Gris and unravel the mystery holding captive the most powerful being of the realm. Face horrible creatures, find clues, and solve puzzles.
